page_content:
MarkLogic Corporation

MarkLogic Server - Enterprise NoSQL Database Software PAAS Solutions

MarkLogic Server is the ONLY Enterprise NoSQL database delivering a unified software platform/database with built-in search/alerting & integrated application services. MarkLogic’s XML/RDF centric, schema-agnostic, No-ETL, transactional, secure, ACID-compliant, cloud-based services delivers accelerated time-to-value, real-time, mission-critical, enterprise-scalable, data-management solutions, supporting XML/JSON/HDFS/XQUERY/SPARQL technologies with alerting & remote user operations.

Features

  • Enterprise NoSQL database delivers mission-critical Big-Data capabilities, applications & solutions.
  • Patented Universal Index drives user search/query & real-time alerting capabilities.
  • ACID compliance ensuring no possible data-loss with full transactional integrity.
  • Clustered, High-Availability/DR; automated-failover & backup delivers complete enterprise assurance.
  • Automated, Cluster-Management & unique Flexible-Replication gives full function anytime/anywhere.
  • Government/Military-grade security at document and compartment level protects ALL data.
  • Enterprise scalability and automated Server Elasticity provides smooth Cloud experiences.
  • On-premise and/or Cloud Deployment provides flexibility to meet all requirements.
  • Powerful Analytics with flexible Visualisation options provide user-friendly Application Interfaces.
  • Semantic/Triple-Store & Object-Based-Intelligence provide perfect platforms for secure applications.

Benefits

  • The ONLY Enterprise NoSQL database: Scalable; Robust; ACID-compliant; Transactional; Secure.
  • Eliminate Data Silos. Massively reducing schema-design costs and ETL overhead/timescales.
  • Create a Single Enterprise Data-Layer. Significantly reducing integration costs/resources.
  • Develop Applications Faster: Agile development accelerates Time-to-Value and future flexibility.
  • Rapid Data Ingestion: Loads ALL data “As-Is” with automated indexing.
  • Reduce Data Storage Costs: Efficient Tiered-Storage and Hadoop Inter-operability options.
  • Secure Your Data: Government-Grade Security protects ALL data, always, forever.
  • Integrated Single Intelligence Environment: NoSQL Database; Semantic; Search & Application-Framework
  • Mission-Critical Systems: Real-time search & alerts, deliver sub-second applications performance.
  • Efficient Clustering, Data-Compression/Indexing & Commodity-Servers reduces hardware costs.

Pricing

£1250.0 per unit per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Year
  • Trial and free options available

Certifications

Certifications
Name Content
Vendor certification(s)
  • US CCEVS EAL2 with ALC_FLR.3 Common Criteria Security Certification.
  • ACID Compliance & Transactional Integrity Certification.
  • MarkLogic Server Certified to operation on WMWare Virtualisation Softwtare
  • All Support/Consulting/Training staff are Certified by MarkLogic Corporation.
  • Support Services are the ONLY MarkLogic-Accredited Product Support Service World-wide
  • Consultancy Services provide the most Experienced Certified MarkLogic Expertise in UK.
  • Training Services provide Certification for ALL MarkLogic Software/Development.
  • All MarkLogic Consultants are Certified Java, Javascript & XQuery Developers.
  • MarkLogic Consultants with Oracle, Microsoft, & VMWare Certifications are available.
